migration.testGuideDesc: Step-by-step guide to test the data migration system
migration.prerequisitesDesc: You need access to a PostgreSQL or MySQL database to test migrations. You can use a local database or a cloud-hosted one.
migration.step1Desc: Go to the "Storage Provider" section above and configure either PostgreSQL or MySQL:
migration.step1Item1: Enter your database connection details (host, port, database name)
migration.step1Item3: Enable SSL if your database requires it
migration.step1Item4: Click "Test Connection" to verify it works
migration.step2Desc: Choose a simple table from your Supabase database for testing:
migration.step2Item1: Start with a small table (under 100 rows)
migration.step2Item2: Pick a table without complex foreign key relationships
migration.step3Desc: Click the "Migrate" button and configure the migration:
migration.step3Item4: Enable "Dry run mode" to preview without making changes
migration.step3Item5: Review the migration plan and start
migration.step4Item2: Check the row count matches your source table
migration.step4Item4: No data should be written in dry-run mode
migration.step5Desc: Once dry-run succeeds, test actual migration:
migration.step5Item1: Repeat the process but disable "Dry run mode"
migration.step5Item2: This will actually copy the data to your target database
migration.step5Item3: Verify data appears in your target database
migration.step5Item4: Check that foreign keys and constraints are preserved
migration.proTipDesc: Use PostgreSQL for initial testing - it has the best feature support. Once working, you can test MySQL if needed.
migration.scenario1: Small table with simple columns (text, numbers, dates)
migration.scenario4: Large table (1000+ rows) to test performance

wizard.title: Data Migration Wizard
wizard.testingSetupDesc: Configure PostgreSQL or MySQL in Storage Provider settings before migrating. Supabase is already configured as your source.
wizard.migrationNamePlaceholder: Enter a name for this migration
wizard.dryRunAlert: Dry run mode will simulate the migration without making actual changes.
wizard.noTablesFound: No tables found in source database
wizard.providerNotConfigured: provider not configured. Please configure it in the Storage Provider settings first.

providers.supabase: Full-featured Supabase backend with real-time, storage, and auth

ai.knowledgeBaseSuggestionsDesc: Recommend relevant help articles to agents
ai.conversationSummarizationDesc: Generate concise summaries of long ticket threads
ai.templateSuggestionsDesc: AI suggests pre-written templates based on ticket context

autoExecution.title: AI Auto-Execution
autoExecution.description: Configure AI to automatically execute approved actions without manual review.
autoExecution.enabledDesc: Allow AI to automatically execute actions with high confidence
autoExecution.warningEnabled: Warning: AI will automatically perform actions above the confidence threshold without manual approval.
autoExecution.permissiveThreshold: AI will execute most actions with minimal oversight
autoExecution.balancedThreshold: Balanced approach between automation and oversight
autoExecution.strictThreshold: Only high-confidence actions will be auto-executed
autoExecution.respondDesc: AI can automatically send responses to customer inquiries
autoExecution.updateStatusDesc: AI can change ticket status automatically
autoExecution.changePriorityDesc: AI can adjust ticket priority levels
autoExecution.sendUpdatesDesc: AI can send status updates to customers
autoExecution.logEscalationsDesc: AI can log when tickets need escalation
autoExecution.scheduleFollowUpsDesc: AI can schedule follow-up actions automatically
autoExecution.safetyPoint1: All actions are logged in the audit trail
autoExecution.safetyPoint2: You can review and override any AI decision
autoExecution.safetyPoint3: AI learns from your corrections to improve over time
autoExecution.safetyPoint4: Critical actions always require human approval

privacy.demoDescription: Create a ticket with PII data (like email, phone, SSN, or credit card) to see the privacy protection features in action. You can also click "Scan for PII" to analyze existing tickets.
privacy.consentNeeded: Before AI can process this data, you must confirm:
privacy.consentCheckbox: I confirm that I have proper consent and authorization to process this personal data with AI assistance according to GDPR and data protection regulations.
privacy.requiresSpecialHandling: This ticket contains personal information that requires special handling under data protection regulations.
privacy.gdprArticle9: GDPR Article 9 Special Category Data Detected
privacy.gdprArticle9Description: This ticket contains special categories of personal data (health, financial, or biometric information) that require explicit consent and additional safeguards under GDPR.
privacy.risk1: Personal data will be sent to AI service for processing
privacy.risk2: Data may be temporarily stored by the AI provider
privacy.risk3: Potential exposure if AI service is compromised
privacy.euAIActDescription: This system uses AI for ticket analysis and response suggestions (Limited Risk Category). Human oversight is maintained through manual review and consent requirements.
privacy.rightToAccess: Right to access your personal data (GDPR Art. 15)
privacy.rightToObject: Right to object to automated processing (GDPR Art. 21-22)
privacy.consentCheckboxFull: I understand the risks and consent to AI processing of this sensitive data.
privacy.proceedWithConsent: Or proceed with consent - only use AI after confirming customer agreement
privacy.anonymizeDescription: Redact personal information before AI processing for enhanced privacy protection

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.enablePiiDetectionDesc: Automatically detect personal information in tickets (emails, phone numbers, etc.)
dataProtection.requireConsentDesc: Show warning and require explicit consent before processing PII with AI
dataProtection.autoAnonymizeDesc: Automatically redact PII before sending to AI
dataProtection.dataRetentionDesc: Tickets will be automatically archived after this period
dataProtection.complianceDesc: These settings help ensure your organization complies with GDPR Article 6, 9, and 22, as well as EU AI Act transparency requirements for Limited Risk AI systems.

security.encryptionAtRestDesc: All data stored in the database is encrypted using AES-256 encryption. This includes tickets, messages, user profiles, and all sensitive information.
security.encryptionInTransitDesc: All communication between your browser and our servers uses TLS 1.3 encryption, ensuring your data is protected during transmission.
security.rlsPolicies: Row-Level Security (RLS) policies on all database tables
security.securityAudits: Regular security audits and compliance checks
security.gdprCompliance: GDPR and data protection compliance built-in
